name: POLYGUN
description:
PolyGun is a completely F2P (Free to Play) Experience.

You will survive in the vast world of PolyGun by fighting off players, wildlife, and the environment. You can overcome these challenges by building a shelter and killing animals for meat. You can scavenge the map by going to various different POIs (Point of Interests) Here you will find various components to build your arsenal of weapons. Visit highly protected military bases and find yourself with military grade weapons. Your experience in PolyGun is made from your choice, one to the next. Will you make the right choice?

PolyGun offers a variety of servers to meet your playstyle, upon joining you will scavenge for resources located in mounuments around the map. You will encounter other players along your journey. PolyGun is an extremely hostile environment with various dangers which will lay in your way. PolyGun's main focus is PVP (player vs player) In PolyGun you can lose all of your stuff in a matter of seconds if you don't make the right choices. PolyGun is an extremely thrilling first person experience which takes you head on with an exciting take as a low poly post apocalyptic experience. Play now for FREE.

Will your choices determine your fate?
